txt.en: Wanted: Studded sword sheaths from the Men and goblins throughout the Bruinen Source.  \n\nThe dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of studded sword sheaths.
This collection box is checked daily by the dwarves. Your collection is sure to reach the requesting party.

'There are Men here in the mountains that have come from Angmar for some uncertain reason. It is clear that they and the goblins are dangerously close to aligning. We must stop them both. Bring me proof in the form of their broken weapons or sword sheaths.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Studded Sword Sheaths
The dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of studded sword sheaths.
Deliver the studded sword sheaths to Larus Sharpshard at Gl√≥in's Camp in the Misty Mountains
Collection boxes for this task can be found at the camps within the Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should bring the trophies you gathered to a collection box.
Wanted: Studded sword sheaths from the Men and goblins throughout the Bruinen Source.
Collect studded sword sheaths and drop them in a collection box ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
